regexCodeList.string: You pant and gasp, trying to catch your breath.
^(.*)You have (\d+),(\d+),(\d+) experience points and need (\d+),(\d+) to advance.$

Trigger.name: Prompt
Trigger.script:
deleteLine();
if (matches[2] == "") then append = "" else append = matches[2] .. "<DarkGreen> | " end
percentage = {1,1,1} percentage[1] = round(matches[3] / Self.hp,0) percentage[2] = round(matches[4] / Self.sp,0) percentage[3] = round(matches[5] / Self.st,0)
for i=1,2,1 do if (percentage[i] > 66) then percentage[i] = "<DarkGreen>" .. percentage[i] elseif (percentage[i] > 33) then percentage[i] = "<yellow>" .. percentage[i] else percentage[i] = "<red>" .. percentage[i] end end
if (percentage[3] > 66) then percentage[3] = "<DarkGreen>" .. matches[5] elseif (percentage[3] > 33) then percentage[3] = "<yellow>" .. matches[5] else percentage[3] = "<red>" .. matches[5] end
if (battle == true) then cecho("\n" .. append .. percentage[1] .. "%h, " .. percentage[2] .. "%m, " .. percentage[3] .. "e, <DarkGreen>"..Self.xp.."%x | " .. Target.hp .. "\n") else cecho("\n" .. append .. percentage[1] .. "%h, " .. percentage[2] .. "%m, " .. percentage[3] .. "e, <DarkGreen>"..Self.xp.."%x |\n") end
if(new_room == true) then dir = tmpdir previousRoomID = tmpprev --proc_room() centerview(gmcp.room.info.num) new_room = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^(.*) is (.*) on the (.*) with your (.*) causing (.*) damage\.$
^You fail to hit (.*) with your attack\.$
You begin to speak the words of the spell...
One small, flaming dart shoots from your hand to (.*).

Trigger.name: Build QW
Trigger.script: deleteLine() if (matches[16] ~= "Someone") then table.insert(quickWho, matches[16]) qwLen = qwLen + 1; end

Trigger.name: End Who
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() echo("
") printTable(qwLen,quickWho) echo("

You see "..qwLen.." players online") disableTrigger("Clean Who") disableTrigger("Build QW") disableTrigger("End Who")

regexCodeList.string: ^(A |An |The )?(.*) has several minor wounds and bruises\.$
^(A |An |The )?(.*) has some very significant wounds and scratches\.$
^You are (.*) on the (.*) by (an |a |the )?(.*)'s (.*) causing (.*) damage.$
^(An |A |The )?(.*) fails to hit you with (.*) attack\.$
^(An |A |The )?(.*) dodges out of the way of your first attack.$
